component.name: GSEA
component.doc: Gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) from the Broad Institute
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: rnk
input.doc: Ranked gene list as produced by DEG2Rnk.

input.name: categories
input.doc: Mapping of gene set names to category names (optional). If provided, enriched output gene sets will be annotated with category names in a separate column.

output.name: enrichedUp
output.doc: Gene sets enriched for up-regulated genes.

output.name: enrichedDown
output.doc: Gene sets enriched for down-regulated genes.

parameter.name: gmt
parameter.doc: Comma-separated list of GMT files used for GSEA (required).

parameter.name: label
parameter.doc: Name of analyzed gene list. Must be valid file name. (required).

parameter.name: options
parameter.doc: Other options passed on to GSEA. (optional).
